title.en: Vajra Speech of the Prayer to Noble Avalokiteśvara from the Great Siddha Thangtong Gyalpo's Life as Bhikṣu Padma Karpo

text.en: To you I pray, guru Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so lama chenrezik

text.en: To you I pray, yidam Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so yidam chenrezik

text.en: To you I pray, sublime noble Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so pakchok chenrezik

text.en: To you I pray, lord of refuge Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so kyab gön chenrezik

text.en: To you I pray, loving protector Avalokiteśvara.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jam gön chenrezik

text.en: Hold me in your compassion, caring and victorious one.
text.en-trans: tukjé zung shik gyalwa tukjé chen

text.en: For us beings who wander endlessly throughout saṃsāra
text.en-trans: tamé khorwar drangmé khyam gyur ching

text.en: And are subjected to intolerable pain and suffering,
text.en-trans: zömé dukngal nyongwé drowa la

text.en: Protector, we have no other refuge but you.
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé lé kyab zhen ma chi so

text.en: Inspire us to attain omniscience and awakening.
text.en-trans: namkhyen sangye tobpar jingyi lob

text.en: Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with hatred take birth in the hells,
text.en-trans: zhedang wang gi nyalwar kyé gyur té

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of intense heat and cold:
text.en-trans: tsadrang dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in your presence, O supreme of deities!
text.en-trans: lha chok khyé kyi drung du kyewar shok

text.en: Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with miserliness take birth in the preta realm,
text.en-trans: serné wang gi yidak né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of intense hunger and thirst:
text.en-trans: trekom dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in your supreme Potala pureland!
text.en-trans: zhing chok potala ru kyewar shok

text.en: Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with folly take birth as animals,
text.en-trans: timuk wang gi düdror kyé gyur té

text.en: And experience the misery of verbal incapacity and confusion:
text.en-trans: lenkuk dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in your presence, O protector!
text.en-trans: gönpo khyé kyi drung du kyewar shok

text.en: Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with jealousy take birth in the asura realm,
text.en-trans: trakdok wang gi lhamin né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of conflict and dispute:
text.en-trans: tabtsö dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in the Potala pureland!
text.en-trans: po ta la yi zhing du kyewar shok

text.en: Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with pride take birth in the deva realm,
text.en-trans: ngagyal wang gi lha yi né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of transmigration and fall:
text.en-trans: po tung dukngal nyongwé semchen nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in the Potala pureland!
text.en-trans: po ta la yi zhing du kyewar shok

text.en: Through the force of negative karma, accumulated throughout beginningless time,
text.en-trans: tokmé dü né lé ngen sakpé tü

text.en: Beings who are overcome with passionate desire take birth in the human realm,
text.en-trans: döchak wang gi mi yi né su kyé

text.en: Where they suffer the torments of birth, old age, sickness and death:
text.en-trans: kyé ga na chi dukngal nyongwa nam

text.en: May they all be reborn in the Potala pureland!1
text.en-trans: po ta la yi zhing du kyewar shok

text.en: May I, in this and all my future lives,
text.en-trans: dak ni kyé zhing kyewa tamché du

text.en: Through activity like that of Avalokiteśvara,
text.en-trans: chenrezik dang dzepa tsungpa yi

text.en: Liberate the beings of impure realms,
text.en-trans: ma dak zhing gi dro nam drolwa dang

text.en: And transmit the supreme speech of the six syllables throughout the ten directions!
text.en-trans: sung chok yik druk chok chur gyepar shok

text.en: Through the force of invoking you, the supremely noble,
text.en-trans: pakchok khyé la solwa tabpé tü

text.en: May all those whom I must discipline and guide,
text.en-trans: dak gi duljar gyurpé drowa nam

text.en: Take interest in cause and effect, strive to act virtuously,
text.en-trans: lé dré lhurlen gewé lé la tsön

text.en: And come to possess the qualities that may benefit all.
text.en-trans: drowé döndu chö dang denpa shok
